data.comment: It is reported that 9033 spectators are in attendance today.
The big names in today's match at Krasnodar Stadium have now been confirmed.
The match is underway at Krasnodar Stadium.
In the minute 2, Free kick for Krasnodar in their own half.
At Krasnodar Stadium, Krasnodar are penalized for being offside.
Lokomotiv Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 4, Ball goes out of play for a Krasnodar goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Lokomotiv Moscow is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 5, Krasnodar take a 1-0 lead thanks to Viktor Claesson.
Lokomotiv Moscow have been awarded a corner by Vladimir Moskalev.
Vladimir Moskalev awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 8, Vladimir Moskalev signals a free kick to Lokomotiv Moscow in their own half.
Free kick Krasnodar.
Vladimir Moskalev awards Lokomotiv Moscow a goal kick.
In the minute 10, Vladimir Moskalev signals a Lokomotiv Moscow throw-in in Krasnodar's half.
Goal kick for Krasnodar at Krasnodar Stadium.
Goal! Krasnodar extend their lead to 2-0 through Remy Cabella.
In the minute 11, That's a fine assist from Alexey Ionov.
Lokomotiv Moscow to take a throw-in in Krasnodar territory.
Throw-in for Lokomotiv Moscow in the half of Krasnodar.
In the minute 13, Krasnodar awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Krasnodar get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lokomotiv Moscow's half?
Free kick for Krasnodar in the half of Lokomotiv Moscow.
In the minute 16, Lokomotiv Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
Vladislav Ignatev of Lokomotiv Moscow gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Krasnodar.
In the minute 18, Corner awarded to Lokomotiv Moscow.
Krasnodar's Marcus Berg breaks free at Krasnodar Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Lokomotiv Moscow have a goal kick.
In the minute 22, Vladimir Moskalev signals a free kick to Lokomotiv Moscow in their own half.
Throw-in for Krasnodar in their own half.
Lokomotiv Moscow's Dmitry Rybchinskiy is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 26, Vladimir Moskalev signals a free kick to Krasnodar.
Krasnodar push upfield but Vladimir Moskalev quickly pulls them for offside.
In Krasnodar Krasnodar attack through Marcus Berg. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 27, Goal kick for Lokomotiv Moscow at Krasnodar Stadium.
In Krasnodar a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Vladimir Moskalev signals a Lokomotiv Moscow throw-in in Krasnodar's half.
In the minute 30, Cristian Ramirez for Krasnodar gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Lokomotiv Moscow goal kick.
Throw-in Lokomotiv Moscow.
In the minute 32, Krasnodar are caught offside.
Free kick for Lokomotiv Moscow in the half of Krasnodar.
Lokomotiv Moscow's Anton Miranchuk gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 37, Krasnodar have a goal kick.
Free kick Krasnodar.
Slobodan Rajkovic for Lokomotiv Moscow has been booked by Vladimir Moskalev and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 39, It's a goal kick for the away team in Krasnodar.
Vladimir Moskalev signals a free kick to Lokomotiv Moscow.
Free kick for Krasnodar in their own half.
In the minute 43, Lokomotiv Moscow have been awarded a penalty in Krasnodar...
A massive blow for Lokomotiv Moscow as Anton Miranchuk misses from the spot.
Vladimir Moskalev will wait an extra 2 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
In the minute 45, In Krasnodar a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in for Krasnodar at Krasnodar Stadium.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half has just kicked-off.
Krasnodar awarded a free kick in their own half.
Marko Nikolic is making the team's first substitution at Krasnodar Stadium with Daniil Kulikov replacing Vladislav Ignatev.
In the minute 47, Vladimir Moskalev awards Krasnodar a goal kick.
Lokomotiv Moscow awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Lokomotiv Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 48, Throw-in for Lokomotiv Moscow in the half of Krasnodar.
Free kick Krasnodar.
Krasnodar drive forward but Yuri Gazinskiy is judged offside.
In the minute 50, Vladimir Moskalev signals a throw-in for Krasnodar, close to Lokomotiv Moscow's area.
Can Lokomotiv Moscow get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Krasnodar's half?
Throw-in Lokomotiv Moscow.
Vladimir Moskalev signals a free kick to Lokomotiv Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 52, Egor Sorokin (Krasnodar) gets a yellow card.
Viktor Claesson (Krasnodar) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
In the minute 54, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In Krasnodar Lokomotiv Moscow drive forward through Eder. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Free kick for Lokomotiv Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 57, Dmitry Rybchinskiy for Lokomotiv Moscow drives towards goal at Krasnodar Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Lokomotiv Moscow at Krasnodar Stadium.
Free kick for Lokomotiv Moscow in the half of Krasnodar.
In the minute 59, Viktor Claesson is booked for the home team.
Lokomotiv Moscow advance rapidly upfield but Vladimir Moskalev blows for offside.
Krasnodar make their first substitution with Wanderson replacing Alexey Ionov.
In the minute 62, Krasnodar are pushing forward but Viktor Claesson's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Lokomotiv Moscow at Krasnodar Stadium.
Eder (Lokomotiv Moscow) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 63, Lokomotiv Moscow have been awarded a corner by Vladimir Moskalev.
Ball safe as Krasnodar is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Tonny Vilhena is replacing Yuri Gazinskiy for Krasnodar at Krasnodar Stadium.
In the minute 64, Murad Olegovich Musaev (Krasnodar) is making a third substitution, with Shapi Suleymanov replacing Remy Cabella.
Krasnodar's Remy Cabella has been booked in Krasnodar.
Corner awarded to Krasnodar.
In the minute 67, Throw-in for Krasnodar close to the penalty box.
Vladimir Moskalev signals a free kick to Lokomotiv Moscow in their own half.
Lokomotiv Moscow surge into the attack at Krasnodar Stadium but Eder’s header is off-target.
In the minute 68, It's a goal kick for the home team in Krasnodar.
Krasnodar awarded a free kick in their own half.
Maciej Rybus (Lokomotiv Moscow) has received a yellow card from Vladimir Moskalev.
In the minute 71, Vladimir Moskalev signals a free kick to Krasnodar.
Ball goes out of play for a Lokomotiv Moscow goal kick.
Lokomotiv Moscow's Grzegorz Krychowiak gets in a shot on goal at Krasnodar Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 72, Nikita Iosifov is on a sub for Stanislav Magkeev for Lokomotiv Moscow.
Krasnodar to take a throw-in in Lokomotiv Moscow territory.
Goal! Marcus Berg extends Krasnodar's lead to 3-0.
In the minute 75, Great play from Igor Smolnikov to set up the goal.
Vladimir Moskalev awards the home team a throw-in.
In Krasnodar a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 78, At Krasnodar Stadium, Vedran Corluka has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Great finish from Shapi Suleymanov to give Krasnodar a 4-0 lead.
In the minute 80, Igor Smolnikov instrumental with a fine assist.
Eduard Spertsyan is replacing Viktor Claesson for the home team.
The home team have replaced Cristian Ramirez with Evgeni Chernov. This is the fifth substitution made today by Murad Olegovich Musaev.
Free kick for Lokomotiv Moscow in their own half.
Vladimir Moskalev signals a free kick to Krasnodar in their own half.
In the minute 84, Goal! Marcus Berg extends Krasnodar's lead to 5-0.
In the minute 86, Krasnodar awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Krasnodar awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Lokomotiv Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 88, Free kick for Lokomotiv Moscow in their own half.
Lokomotiv Moscow drives forward and Anton Miranchuk gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Vladimir Moskalev awards Krasnodar a goal kick.
In the minute 89, Vladimir Moskalev signals a free kick to Krasnodar in their own half.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 2 minutes of added time.
In Krasnodar a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Corner awarded to Lokomotiv Moscow.
It's 5-0 as the referee blows for full-time.
Kristoffer Olsson (Krasnodar) has received a first yellow card.
